screen_desc: This screenshot displays a Google Flights search for flights from New York, NY to San Francisco, CA. The user has selected dates between December 3 and December 10, with options for economy, round-trip, and low-emission flights. The results show different airlines, including multiple airlines, United, and JetBlue, with prices starting from $243. There is also an option for nonstop flights from $217 to Oakland (OAK). The user can view more flight details by clicking "Show flights."
